### Show genotype trajectories as Muller plot 

```{r}
library(MullerPlot)

PopulationData = read.table(file = "genotype_table.csv", row.names = 1, sep = ",")
colnames(PopulationData) =  PopulationData[1,]
PopulationData = PopulationData[-1,]

Attributes = read_csv("adjacency_matrix.csv")

```

```{r}
layout(matrix(c(1,2), nrow = 1), widths = c(0.4, 0.2))
m.plot <- Muller.plot(attributes = Attributes, population.data = PopulationData,
          data.method = "table", time.interval.method = "equal",mgp=c(2,0.5,0), xlab = "Step")
plot(0,0,axes = F)
par(mar=c(0, 0, 0, 0))
legend("right", legend = m.plot$name,col = as.character(m.plot$color),pch = 19, border = "white",box.col = "white", box.lwd = 3)
```
